text: The first oranges weren’t orange — they were green.
Turtles can breathe through their butts.
There's a species of jellyfish that can live forever — biologically immortal!
In Switzerland, it's illegal to own just one guinea pig because they get lonely.
Your stomach gets a new lining every 3 to 4 days to prevent it from digesting itself.
Humans share about 60% of their DNA with bananas.
Cows moo in regional accents.
There's a basketball court on the top floor of the U.S. Supreme Court building — it's called 'the highest court in the land'.
A day on Uranus lasts about 17 hours, and it spins sideways.
Kangaroos can't walk backward.
The inventor of Pringles is buried in a Pringles can.
There's a town in Norway called Hell, and it freezes over every winter.
Octopuses have nine brains and blue blood.
Some frogs can be frozen solid and still survive.
A shrimp's heart is located in its head.
The word 'robot' comes from a Czech word that means 'forced labor'.
A snail can sleep for three years at a time.
There are more fake flamingos in the world than real ones.
Sea otters hold hands while sleeping so they don’t drift apart.
The inventor of the microwave only got $2 for his discovery.
Walt Disney was afraid of mice.
Humans are the only animals that blush.
The shortest war in history lasted 38 minutes.
A banana is technically a berry, but a strawberry isn’t.
The first computer virus was created in 1986 and was called 'Brain'.
A group of flamingos is called a 'flamboyance'.
You can't lick your own elbow—it's physically impossible for most people.
Sloths can hold their breath longer than dolphins can.
The Eiffel Tower can grow over 6 inches during the summer due to heat expansion.
Sharks existed before trees.
There's a planet made entirely of diamonds called 55 Cancri e.
Some cats are allergic to humans.
A cloud can weigh over a million pounds.
The unicorn is the national animal of Scotland.
Bubble wrap was originally intended to be used as wallpaper.
Peanuts aren't technically nuts—they're legumes.
The longest hiccuping spree lasted 68 years.
Birds don’t urinate—they excrete waste as uric acid instead.
There’s an island in Japan inhabited only by bunnies.
A jiffy is an actual unit of time: 1/100th of a second.
The world's largest desert is Antarctica.
